channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA

item.title: CVE-2023-0823|2023-03-27T15:37:40.612Z -- unknown -- cookie%20notice%20%26%20compliance%20for%20gdpr%20%2F%20ccpa
item.description: The Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA WordPress plugin before 2.4.7 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
